trans-unit.source: ack works with similar arguments as grep, and accepts -C. But it's usually better for searching through code.
trans-unit.target: ack使用与grep类似的参数，并接受 -C 。 但是通常通过代码搜索会更好。

trans-unit.source: -5 gets you 5 lines above and below the match 'thestring' is equivalent to -C 5 or -A 5 -B 5.
trans-unit.target: -5 使您在匹配'thestring'上方和下方的 5 行等效于 -C 5 或 -A 5 -B 5 。

trans-unit.source: -A and -B will work, as will -C n (for n lines of context), or just -n (for n lines of context... as long as n is 1 to 9).
trans-unit.target: -A 和 -B 将起作用， -C n （对于 n 行上下文）或 -n （对于 n 行上下文...只要n为1到9）都将起作用。

trans-unit.source: -C, --context NUM - Show NUM lines before and after each match.
trans-unit.target: -C ，-- --context NUM 在每次匹配之前和之后显示NUM行。

trans-unit.source: Note: Replace a and b variables with number of lines before and after.
trans-unit.target: 注意：用前后的行数替换 a 和 b 变量。

trans-unit.source: For BSD or GNUgrep you can use -B num to set how many lines before the match and -A num for the number of lines after the match.
trans-unit.target: 对于BSD或GNU grep ,您可以使用 -B num 设置匹配之前的行数，而 -A num 设置匹配之后的行数。

trans-unit.source: Grep has an option called Context Line Control, you can use the --context in that, simply,
trans-unit.target: Grep有一个名为 Context Line Control 的选项，您可以在其中使用 --context ，

trans-unit.source: I would like to grep for a string, but also show the preceding five lines and the following five lines as well as the matched line. How would I be able to do this?
trans-unit.target: 我想 grep 一个字符串，但还要显示前五行和后五行以及匹配的行。 我将如何做到这一点？

trans-unit.source: If you care about the performance, use ripgrep which has similar syntax to grep, e.g.
trans-unit.target: 如果您关心性能，请使用 ripgrep ，其语法与 grep 相似，例如

trans-unit.source: If you want the same number of lines before and after you can use -C num.
trans-unit.target: 如果您希望前后使用相同数量的行，则可以使用 -C num 。

trans-unit.source: It's especially useful for system which doesn't support grep's -A, -B and -C parameters.
trans-unit.target: 这对于不支持grep的 -A ， -B 和 -C 参数的系统特别有用。

trans-unit.source: Many GNU tools also have an info page that may have more useful information in addition to the man page.
trans-unit.target: 许多GNU工具还具有一个信息页面 ，该信息页面除手册页面外可能还有更多有用的信息。

trans-unit.source: Many of the tools like grep also have really great man files too. I find myself referring to grep's man page a lot because there is so much you can do with it.
trans-unit.target: 许多工具（例如grep）也具有非常好的man文件。 我发现自己经常参考grep的手册页，因为您可以做很多事情。

trans-unit.source: Search for "17655" in "/some/file.txt" showing 10 lines context before and after (using Awk), output preceded with line number followed by a colon. Use this on Solaris when 'grep' does not support the "-[ACB]" options.
trans-unit.target: 在 "somefile.txt "中搜索 "17655",显示前后10行上下文(使用Awk),输出前有行号,后有冒号。当'grep'不支持"-[ACB]"选项时,在Solaris上使用。

trans-unit.source: Should do the trick
trans-unit.target: 应该做的事

trans-unit.target: 这就相当于

trans-unit.source: That will grep "myfile" for "astring", and show 5 lines before and after each match
trans-unit.target: 这将为 "astring "提供grep "myfile",并在每次匹配前后显示5行

trans-unit.source: The tool is built on top of Rust's regex engine which makes it very efficient on the large data.
trans-unit.target: 该工具建立在Rust的正则表达式引擎之上，这使其在大数据上非常高效 。

trans-unit.source: There are also parameters such as -A/--after-context and -B/--before-context.
trans-unit.target: 还有一些参数，例如 -A / --after-context 和 -B / --before-context 。

trans-unit.source: This will show 3 lines before and 3 lines after.
trans-unit.target: 这样就会显示前3行,后3行。

trans-unit.target: 使用grep

trans-unit.target: grep一个文件,但显示周边几行
